problem_name: Image Classification and Object Detection in Remote Sensing
description: This problem involves identifying and classifying objects within images captured from remote sensing technologies. It is crucial for applications such as environmental monitoring, urban planning, and disaster management.
you_have_this_if: You are working with large datasets of satellite or aerial images.
You need to detect and classify multiple objects in real-time.
You require high accuracy in identifying features from images.
Your project involves cloud-based image processing solutions.
You are facing challenges with traditional image analysis methods.

approaches.best_for: When you need to analyze large volumes of astronomical image data or require real-time detection in remote sensing applications.
approaches.key_tradeoff: YOLOv5 offers high speed and accuracy but may require significant computational resources.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to process and analyze large volumes of images quickly while maintaining high accuracy.

start_here: Start with YOLOv5 for image classification and object detection in remote sensing, as it balances speed and accuracy effectively for large datasets.
